Chapter 1057

Three days later, early in the morning. 

Parasol Tree City, the foot of Phoenix Perch Mountain. 

The sound of classics read aloud emanated from halfway up the mountain, reverberating throughout like the ringing of a morning bell or the beating of an evening drum.

Numerous cultivators clustered at the foot of the mountain, listening attentively as if drunk or infatuated.

The reading of classic texts contained the truths of the Grand Dao. Over the years, no shortage of cultivators had come to listen in and glean enlightenment.

Fei Yun stood in the distance, but when he saw this, his eyes shone with contempt. When mortals burn incense to the gods and pray for peace and prosperity, they’re only fooling themselves.

If these cultivators think they can improve their cultivation by coming here to listen to the classics, they’re ultimately no different from those mundane mortals.

“Profound Sky Academy dared remain standing even after killing the little creepy crawly and Pi Mo’s subordinates? Their courage is extraordinary.” Fei Yun looked up the mountainside.
